description: This file is a minified polyfill and utility script for web components, including URL parsing, WeakMap, MutationObserver, HTMLTemplateElement, and performance/requestAnimationFrame polyfills, used in the Polymer project.

classes.name: HTMLTemplateElement
classes.description: Polyfill for HTMLTemplateElement, enabling template content and innerHTML property in browsers that lack native support.

classes.name: WeakMap
classes.description: Polyfill for WeakMap, providing weakly held key-value pairs in environments without native WeakMap support.

classes.name: JsMutationObserver
classes.description: Polyfill for MutationObserver, observing DOM mutations in environments lacking native support.

methods.name: HTMLTemplateElement.decorate
methods.description: Decorates a template element to initialize its content and innerHTML property.

methods.name: HTMLTemplateElement.bootstrap
methods.description: Initializes all template elements in a document.

methods.name: WeakMap.prototype.set
methods.description: Sets a key-value pair in the WeakMap.

methods.name: WeakMap.prototype.get
methods.description: Retrieves a value by key from the WeakMap.

methods.name: WeakMap.prototype.delete
methods.description: Deletes a key-value pair from the WeakMap.

methods.name: WeakMap.prototype.has
methods.description: Checks if a key exists in the WeakMap.

methods.name: JsMutationObserver.prototype.observe
methods.description: Starts observing a DOM node for mutations with specified options.

methods.name: JsMutationObserver.prototype.takeRecords
methods.description: Returns a list of mutation records observed.
